## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

### Frontend
- **React** - UI Framework

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Quick Start (Docker)
```bash
docker-compose up --build
```

### Local Development
```bash
# Backend
cd backend
pip install -r requirements.txt
uvicorn app.main:app --reload

# Frontend
cd frontend
npm install
npm run dev
```
